org.mechio.api.motion

Class AbstractRobot<J extends Joint>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jflux.api.common.rk.property.PropertyChangeNotifier
      • org.mechio.api.motion.AbstractRobot<J>
  • Type Parameters:
    J - Type of Joint used by this Robot
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jflux.api.common.rk.property.PropertyChangeSource, Robot<J>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RemoteRobot, ServoRobot, SynchronizedRobot

    public abstract class AbstractRobot<J extends Joint>
extends org.jflux.api.common.rk.property.PropertyChangeNotifier
implements Robot<J>
    Provides common functionality for Robot implementations
    Author:
    Matthew Stevenson
